title: Which K-pop girl group has a visual hole? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t really like using the term ‘visual hole’, but in this answer I will only use it to refer to the member that fits Korean beauty standards the least. I’ll summarise them here: Small faceV-line jawLarge eyesDouble eyelidsAegyo-salSlim noseNose bridge that inclines to a pointPlump lipsStraight, white teethVery fair skinThe group I am going to talk about in my answer is IZ*ONE, whom many people consider to be a ‘visual group’. In my opinion, IZ*ONE have two top-tier visuals. Top-tier visuals are visuals who are outstandingly pretty and perfectly fit Korean beauty standards. Namely, these are Minju and Hyewon. Minju  Hyewon  Next, we have second-tier visuals. Second-tier visuals are also extremely pretty, even by Korean standards, but don’t necessarily have all the ideal features a top-tier visual has. In IZ*ONE, these are Sakura, Eunbi, Wonyoung, Chaewon, Yujin and Nako. Sakura  Eunbi  Wonyoung  Chaewon  Yujin  Nako  Members in third-tier are usually considered quite cute and pretty, but they don’t fit the Korean beauty standards. In IZ*ONE, the third-tier consists of Yena, Yuri and Hitomi. Yena  Yuri  Hitomi  And finally, fourth-tier. Fourth-tier is simply members who don’t fit the Korean beauty standards and aren’t usually considered pretty. In IZ*ONE, the only member in fourth-tier is Chaeyeon, which technically means she is the ‘visual hole’ (I hate that term so much, seriously). Chaeyeon  Chaeyeon is a cute, hardworking and immensely talented girl. I respect her so much. However, I don’t agree with people who say her visuals are ‘underrated’. I don’t consider Chaeyeon pretty, but this doesn’t matter, because she is so much more than her appearance. Anyway, as you can see, more than half of the IZ*ONE members are in top-tier or second-tier. This is why they are called a visual group. Thank you for reading!

I don’t think this, but I’m going to base this off of typical beauty standards. 2NE1 They were called ugly by YG, but Park Bom received the most hate from netizens, especially after her surgeries. People called her “bloated” and said it looked “like she got stung by a bee”. I remember people saying that she made people not take the group seriously…? She’s a good singer so I don’t know why her looks should matter. 2NE1 are forever queens and icons in Kpop so they can suck it. 2. MAMAMOO  Hwasa was hated on for SO LONG and she still gets hate TO THIS DAY. People called her ugly and “burnt” because of her darker skin, her thicker thighs and arms and facial structure. She has a great body and is very fit, and her eyes and cheekbones are really unique. She’s not “fat” and I don’t understand why she’s called ugly when she’s actually really pretty. MAMAMOO have powerhouse vocals and are non-autotuned queens ad people hating on their looks won’t decrease their talent. 3. f(x)  Amber has a boyish style, and she was attacked from all angles. Both Knetz and Inetz hated on her. Knetz called her “the only man in a girl group” and didn’t like how she didn’t wear crop tops and revealing clothes. Inetz hated on her for being flat-chested and said she should be kicked from her group.  She did a whole video reading hate comments on it. Overall, talent should not be determined by visuals. I’d rather support a talented group who are considered “ugly” than a visual group whose musical talents are mediocre. Regardless of our opinions, we should still stay respectful. Thanks, Stella

upvoters.user_id: Yazmin the Lord and Savior of all Chichis

response.answer_text: Disclaimer: I am not calling these idols ugly, I’m just going off of what Knetz or others say. JooE (MOMOLAND)  Chaeryoung (ITZY)  Sorn (CLC)  Bobby (iKON)
